#summary Mummified undead
#labels GameDesign

Mummies are [Undead undead] that have been [Mummification mummified] to prevent them from rotting. They are made by either [Reanimation raising] [MummifiedCorpse mummified corpses] or mummifying [Zombie zombies].

Mummies are considerably stronger than zombies. Their greatest weakness is fire. In fact, their chemical treatment and wrapping make them burn like torches.
